article_title: Gubernatorial profile: Matt Bevin makes case for smaller government, but facts sometimes wrong
article_text: Republican financier Matt Bevin can talk without notes for an hour about why he wants to be Kentucky's next governor, easily tossing out facts to support his case for a smaller state government that does less. Some of Bevin's facts might come especially easily because they're not correct.

article_summary:
Republican financier Matt Bevin can talk without notes for an hour about why he wants to be Kentucky's next governor, easily tossing out facts to support his case for a smaller state government that does less.
Some of Bevin's facts might come especially easily because they're not correct.
